law.text: Commanding and staff officers of organizations and units are hereby authorized to make such visits of instruction and inspection, when authorized by the adjutant general to do so, as in his discretion may be necessary. When making said visits they may be compensated as provided in KRS 36.140 and 38.205.
law.history: Amended 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 92, sec. 9. -- Amended 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 48, sec. 5. -- Created 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 4, sec. 15.
